price: (82) But if they turn away, [O Muḥammad] - then only upon you is [responsibility for] clear notification.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
